00013         ClientSocket::ClientSocket(SRPPSession* mysession,string address,int port)
00014         {
00015                 cout << "Creating a client socket..\n";
00016 
00017                 host = (struct hostent *) gethostbyname(address.c_str());
00018 
00019 
00020                 if ((sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_DGRAM, 0)) == -1)
00021                 {
00022                         cerr << "Cannot create client socket. Exiting... \n\n";
00023                         exit(1);
00024                 }
00025 
00026                 server_addr.sin_family = AF_INET;
00027                 server_addr.sin_port = htons(port);
00028                 server_addr.sin_addr = *((struct in_addr *)host->h_addr);
00029                 bzero(&(server_addr.sin_zero),8);
00030 
00031 
00032                 addr_len = sizeof(struct sockaddr);
00033 
00034                 thissession = mysession;
00035 
00036         }

00039         ClientSocket::~ClientSocket()
00040         {
00041 
00042             printf("\nClosing socket\n");
00043             // close socket
00044             if(close(sock) == -1)
00045             {
00046                 printf("\nCould not close socket\n");
00047                 return ;
00048             }
00049         }

00052         string ClientSocket::getData()
00053         {
00054                 SRPPMessage srpp_msg = srpp::create_srpp_message("");
00055 
00056                 bytes_read = recvfrom(sock,&srpp_msg,sizeof(srpp_msg),0,
00057                                 (struct sockaddr *)&server_addr,
00058                                                                 (socklen_t *)&addr_len);
00059 
00060                 //Decrypt
00061                 CryptoProfile * crypto = new CryptoProfile("Simple XOR");
00062 
00063                 srpp_msg = srpp::decrypt_srpp(&srpp_msg,crypto,thissession);
00064 
00065 
00066                 srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload[bytes_read] = '\0';
00067 
00068 
00069                 if (bytes_read > 0)
00070                 {
00071                         printf("\n(%s , %d) said : ",inet_ntoa(server_addr.sin_addr),
00072                                                         ntohs(server_addr.sin_port));
00073                         printf("%s\n", (srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload));
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 fflush(stdout);
00077                 return string(srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload);
00078         }

00082         {
00083 
00084                 //Create a SRPPMessage with data in its payload
00085                 SRPPMessage srpp_msg = srpp::create_srpp_message(data);
00086 
00087                 //encrypt
00088                 CryptoProfile * crypto = new CryptoProfile("Simple XOR");
00089 
00090                 srpp_msg = srpp::encrypt_srpp(&srpp_msg,crypto,thissession);
00091

00093                 if (!(data == srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload))
00094                 {
00095                         cout << "ERROR" << srpp_msg.encrypted_part.original_payload << endl;
00096                         exit (-1);
00097                 }
00098 */

00100                 sendto(sock, &srpp_msg, sizeof(srpp_msg), 0,
00101                                       (struct sockaddr *)&server_addr, sizeof(struct sockaddr));

00114         void ClientSocket::get_rtp_packet()
00115         {
00116                 RTPSession sess;
00117                 uint16_t portbase,destport;
00118                 uint32_t destip;
00119                 std::string ipstr;
00120                 int status,i,num;
00121 
00122             portbase = thissession->myPort;
00123                 destip = inet_addr((thissession->receiverIP).c_str());
00124 
00125                 if (destip == INADDR_NONE)
00126                 {
00127                         std::cerr << "Bad IP address specified" << std::endl;
00128                         return -1;
00129                 }
00130 
00131                 destip = ntohl(destip);
00132                 destport = thissession->receiverPort;
00133 
00134                 // Now, we'll create a RTP session, set the destination, send some
00135                 // packets and poll for incoming data.
00136 
00137                 RTPUDPv4TransmissionParams transparams;
00138                 RTPSessionParams sessparams;
00139 
00140                 // IMPORTANT: The local timestamp unit MUST be set, otherwise
00141                 //            RTCP Sender Report info will be calculated wrong
00142                 // In this case, we'll be sending 10 samples each second, so we'll
00143                 // put the timestamp unit to (1.0/10.0)
00144                 sessparams.SetOwnTimestampUnit(1.0/10.0);
00145 
00146                 sessparams.SetAcceptOwnPackets(true);
00147                 transparams.SetPortbase(portbase);
00148                 status = sess.Create(sessparams,&transparams);
00149 
00150                 if (status < 0)
00151                 {
00152                         std::cout << "ERROR: " << RTPGetErrorString(status) << std::endl;
00153                         exit(-1);
00154                 }
00155 
00156                 RTPIPv4Address addr(destip,destport);
00157 
00158                 status = sess.AddDestination(addr);
00159 
00160                 if (status < 0)
00161                 {
00162                         std::cout << "ERROR: " << RTPGetErrorString(status) << std::endl;
00163                         exit(-1);
00164                 }
00165 
00166                 //for (i = 1 ; i <= num ; i++)
00167                 //{
00168 
00169 
00170                         sess.BeginDataAccess();
00171 
00172                         // check incoming packets
00173                         if (sess.GotoFirstSourceWithData())
00174                         {
00175                                 do
00176                                 {
00177                                         RTPPacket *pack;
00178 
00179                                         while ((pack = sess.GetNextPacket()) != NULL)
00180                                         {
00181                                                 // You can examine the data here
00182                                                 printf("Got packet !\n");
00183 
00184                                                 // we don't longer need the packet, so
00185                                                 // we'll delete it
00186                                                 sess.DeletePacket(pack);
00187                                         }
00188                                 } while (sess.GotoNextSourceWithData());
00189                         }
00190 
00191                         sess.EndDataAccess();
00192 
00193         #ifndef RTP_SUPPORT_THREAD
00194                         status = sess.Poll();
00195                         checkerror(status);
00196         #endif // RTP_SUPPORT_THREAD
00197 
00198                         RTPTime::Wait(RTPTime(1,0));
00199                 }
00200 
00201                 sess.BYEDestroy(RTPTime(10,0),0,0);
00202 
00203 
00204 }
